title: The protective effects of sesamin on the ileum in superior mesenteric artery ischemia induced in rats.
abstract: Acute mesenteric artery ischemia is recognized as a significant cause of mortality and morbidity, with its incidence increasing with age. This study aims to investigate the efficacy of sesamin in mitigating the histological, immunological, and biochemical damage associated with superior mesenteric artery ischemia and reperfusion (SMA I/R) injury in the ileum.
journal: Ulusal travma ve acil cerrahi dergisi = Turkish journal of trauma & emergency surgery : TJTES
